faqs.q: How many calories in 1 tsp of sugar?

faqs.a: Yes, 1 tsp sugar is 4 g of carbohydrates, all as sugars.

faqs.q: Does sugar have protein or fat?
faqs.a: No, pure sugar has 0 g protein and 0 g fat.

faqs.q: How much sugar is in 1 tsp?
faqs.a: About 4 g of sugars, equivalent to the full carb content.

faqs.q: What's the difference between white and brown sugar calories?
faqs.a: Similar at ~16 kcal per tsp; brown has trace fiber but negligible impact.
